#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=FIFA World Cup 2018 semifinals :
#Text=Umtiti scores only goal , France reaches finals beating Belgium
#Text=Friday , July 13 , 2018
#Text=On Tuesday , France defeated Belgium 1 – 0 in the FIFA football World Cup semifinals .
#Text=Samuel Umtiti scored the only goal of the match , and France is to play Croatia in the final .
#Text=Belgium had better ball possession in the match .
#Text=French forward Olivier Giroud faced some of his Chelsea teammates Thibaut Courtois and Eden Hazard .
#Text=In the 19th minute , Eden Hazard 's attempt for the goal was headed away by French defender Raphaël Varane .
#Text=French goalkeeper Hugo Lloris saved Toby Alderweireld 's shot in the 22nd minute .
#Text=Benjamin Pavard was denied the opening goal by Courtois in the 39th minute .
#Text=The first half ended goallessly .
#Text=In the second half , Romelu Lukaku missed a chance to put Belgium in lead , from Axel Witsel 's assist .
#Text=Olivier Giroud missed a chance in the 51st minute , blocked .
#Text=Antoine Griezmann took the corner , and French defender Samuel Umtiti scored from a header , giving France the lead .
#Text=Kylian Mbappé assisted Giroud five minutes later but was blocked .
#Text=Belgium made the first substitution at the one-hour mark as Mousa Dembélé was substituted off for Dries Mertens .
#Text=Hazard was the first player to receive a yellow card in the match , for a bad foul in the 63rd minute .
#Text=Toby Alderweireld was booked in the 71st minute .
#Text=Kevin De Bruyne missed a chance to equalise for Belgium in the 76th minute from Hazard 's assist .
#Text=Paul Pogba 's 79th-minute shot missed the target .
#Text=Belgium used their second substitution in the 80th minute as Marouane Fellaini was replaced by Yannick Carrasco .
#Text=Lloris stopped Witsel 's shot on target in the 81st minute .
#Text=In the last few minutes of the 90-minute game , French defender Blaise Matuidi was injured and was replaced by Corentin Tolisso .
#Text=N'Golo Kanté , Mbappé and Jan Vertonghen were booked late in the game .
#Text=The match ended with France scoring the only goal .
#Text=After the match , Belgian coach Roberto Martínez said , " It was a close game and it was very tight and it was going to be decided by that bit of luck in front of goal .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=French coach Didier Deschamps said ,  The most important match is on Sunday , we have given ourselves a huge privilege to reach the final of the World Cup .
